about_the_game:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Mercedes-Benz Remastered includes 5 licensed Mercedes-Benz cars:

- Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Gullwing (W198):
Introduced in 1954, world's fastest production car of its day. First-ever production fuel-injection. Gull-wing doors. Iconic.

- Mercedes-Benz 560 SEC (W126)
Most powerful and desired version of one of the most beautiful cars in history.

- Mercedes-Benz 500E (W124)
High-performance version of the W124 created in close cooperation with Porsche.

- Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG (C197)
Front mid-engine, 2-seater, limited production sports car developed by the Mercedes-AMG division of German automotive manufacturer.

- Mercedes-Benz 280 SL Pagoda (W113)
Two-seat roadster/coupé, introduced at the 1963 Geneva Motor Show, and produced from 1963 through 1971.

Experience them in superb quality and astonishing level of details.
Repair, drive, buy, sell and contemplate them.

5 Engines included in this DLC :
- Mercedes Benz Inline-6 M130 engine
- Mercedes Benz Inline-6 M186 engine
- Mercedes-Benz V8 OHC M117 engine
- Mercedes-Benz V8 DOHC M119 engine
- Mercedes-Benz V8 DOHC M159 engine
detailed_description:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Mercedes-Benz Remastered includes 5 licensed Mercedes-Benz cars:

- Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Gullwing (W198):
Introduced in 1954, world's fastest production car of its day. First-ever production fuel-injection. Gull-wing doors. Iconic.

- Mercedes-Benz 560 SEC (W126)
Most powerful and desired version of one of the most beautiful cars in history.

- Mercedes-Benz 500E (W124)
High-performance version of the W124 created in close cooperation with Porsche.

- Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG (C197)
Front mid-engine, 2-seater, limited production sports car developed by the Mercedes-AMG division of German automotive manufacturer.

- Mercedes-Benz 280 SL Pagoda (W113)
Two-seat roadster/coupé, introduced at the 1963 Geneva Motor Show, and produced from 1963 through 1971.

Experience them in superb quality and astonishing level of details.
